pkgmetadata.longdescription: # testpoetrypypi| | master | develop ||:----------|:-------|:--------|| CI Status | [![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/maxjeffos/testpoetrypypi/tree/master.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/maxjeffos/testpoetrypypi/tree/master)|[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/maxjeffos/testpoetrypypi/tree/develop.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/maxjeffos/testpoetrypypi/tree/develop)|A reference-ish implementation of a Python project that uses:+ Poetry (and pyproject.toml)+ pytest and Black for testing and linting+ CircleCI+ Git Flow (i.e. `master` + `develop` + feature branches)+ [python-semantic-release](https://pypi.org/project/python-semantic-release/) to compute the next version and publish to PyPI upon merging `develop` into `master`.
